summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department, declaring certain real property rights surplus to utility needs; authorizing the Superintendent or his designee to grant an easement for access purposes over a portion of the City's fee-owned Duwamish Transmission Corridor adjacent to South 112th Street in the City of Tukwila, Washington; and accepting payment for the true and full value of the easement from Amalfi Investments, LLC.
